name: Sunshine Daydream
description: From Bodhi Seeds comes Sunshine Daydream, an indica-dominant cross between Appalachia and Bubbashine (a Bubba Kush and Blue Moonshine hybrid). Its flavors are an elaborate blend of tangy diesel and fruit, accented by sweet berry undertones. A descendant of Bubba Kush, Sunshine Daydream is a potently psychoactive indica that brings relief to pain, nausea, inflammation, and other conditions that benefit from THC-rich strains.
descriptionPlain: From Bodhi Seeds comes Sunshine Daydream, an indica-dominant cross between Appalachia and Bubbashine (a Bubba Kush and Blue Moonshine hybrid). Its flavors are an elaborate blend of tangy diesel and fruit, accented by sweet berry undertones. A descendant of Bubba Kush, Sunshine Daydream is a potently psychoactive indica that brings relief to pain, nausea, inflammation, and other conditions that benefit from THC-rich strains.

highlightedReviews.text: Straight Fire before the first water pipe exhale.  She Bitch Slapped my face and left my checks rosey red and forehead sweating.  Felt like that first second after waking from one of those good dreams- disoriented,confused, and happy.  After Second rip, I knew intoxication was now inevitable, the inhale was of buttered popcorn and sour grapes.  It slightly coated mouth as the water i drank afterward tasted buttery. After 1 minute I started to feel some of the body stone yet it was a different stone.  My thighs felt a warming sensation similar to a percocet. The surface of my skin had a slight numbing sensation but not like icey hot. The migraine I had went from a 9 to a 3.  Time slowed, Television was more interesting.  increased appreciation for food tastes but not munchies. Strong alternating waves of Euphoria and relaxation, taking you to the edge of uncomfortable then instantly dropping into a happy relaxing state as if to show you its power while being Kind.
It's like getting into bed with fresh sheet out of the dryer on a cold winter night.

articles.title: New Strains: Ancient OG, Appalachia, Lucky Charms, Mother's Finest, and Sunshine Daydream
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Many of this week’s new strains come at the request of our users, and Leafly strives to target the varieties that are available to you. If you feel that we missed any, let us know! 
Ancient OG and Sunshine Daydream are our new indicas from Bodhi Seeds, and from Sensi Seeds we’ve added their energizing sativa, Mother’s Finest. Looking for something in between? Appalachia and Lucky Charms are the hybrids you’ll want to look out for. If you manage to locate any of these new strains, help our your fellow cannabis enthusiasts by rating and reviewing!
1. Ancient OG
Characteristics of Ancient OG:

Mostly indica strain 
Cross between an Iranian landrace strain and Snow Lotus
Breeder: Bodhi Seeds
Earthy pine and sweet citrus aroma
Indoor flowering time of 70 days; October harvest outdoors

2. Appalachia
Characteristics of Appalachia:

Hybrid strain
Cross between Green Crack and Tres Dawg
Breeder: High & Lonesome Seeds
Earthy pine and subtle fruit aroma
Dreamy and yet functional cerebral buzz paired with relaxing full-body effects
Improves appetite and dulls pain

3. Lucky Charms
Characteristics of Lucky Charms:

50/50 hybrid strain
Cross between The White and Appalachia
Tangy fruit aroma
Indoor flowering time of 9 weeks

4. Mother’s Finest
Characteristics of Mother’s Finest:

70% sativa strain
Heavy Haze genetics
Breeder: Sensi Seeds
Sweet, tangy, earthy aroma
Energetic sativa buzz
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 10 weeks; outdoor harvest at the end of October

5. Sunshine Daydream
Characteristics of Sunshine Daydream:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between Appalachia and Bubbashine
Breeder: Bodhi Seeds  
Tangy diesel, fruit, and berry flavors
May help pain, nausea, and inflammation
